sub_title: Senior Data Scientist (Global Food & Agri Strategy and Positioning - GFASP) at Rabobank
summary:
For the past 20 years Skander Taamallah has been active in various areas related to data & advanced analytics within a range of business domains such as in global business strategy (Rabobank), credit risk (Rabobank), retail marketing (ABN-AMRO Bank), energy & renewables (General Electric & Schneider), aviation systems (Dutch Aerospace Centre & Airbus), and space (European Space Agency).

Mr Taamallah is a big believer in the diversification of work experiences, as this allows for the generation of innovative and new ideas that stem from the cross-pollination over different disciplines.

His interest and passion are related to the future applications of Artificial Intelligence (AI). In particular he believes that AI and cognitive computing are expected to bring in the next revolutions in finance and healthcare.

He is fluent in French, Dutch, English, and Italian. He has further studied and/or worked in 6 countries across 3 continents and holds a natural ability to interact with people from around the world.

Mr Taamallah holds a M.Sc. degree in Electrical Engineering from INSA Toulouse (France), a M.Sc. degree in Aeronautics & Astronautics from Stanford University (USA), and a Ph.D. degree in Modeling & Optimization from TU-Delft (The Netherlands).

Key competences: Data Science, Modeling & Machine Learning, Portfolio Optimization, Algorithmic Trading, Global Optimization Problems, Quantum Computing.
Key software skills: Matlab, Python, SQL, HTML, Teradata, Databricks, Git, Azure, C, Linux,  Linear Matrix Inequalities (YALMIP & LMI-Lab), Latech, MetaTrader4 & MQL

Senior Data Scientist (Global Food & Agri Strategy and Positioning - GFASP) at Rabobank

profile_positions.description:
I have initiated and devloped a multi-disciplinary Food & Agri (F&A) portfolio optimization solution which aims at optimizing portfolio growth and returns while minimizing portfolio risk and CO2e emission footprint.
From a technical point of view our approach can be formulated as a global constrained optimization problem (involving trade-offs between financial KPI's and sustainability KPI's) and making use of a broad range of internal (client) and external data.
From a solution viewpoint we have developed two main approaches: a classical convex optimization approach (in the framework of Linear Matrix Inequalities) and, together with TNO, a Quantum Computing approach (using Simulated Annealing and Quantum Annealing approaches).
Next I have developed a forward-looking portfolio simulation model, using sector, sub-sector, regional, and business line data. This comprehensive model is used for a range of portfolio projections and allows for strategic scenario analysis and the evaluation of the associated trade-offs. The model visualizes the future values of various KPI's such as: exposure growth, exposure concentration, Return On Capital (ROC), absolute CO2e emissions, and emission intensity.
Finally I am leading a Food & Agri Data Science community within Rabobank (by organizing knowledge sharing sessions and infernal conferences on topics related to F&A data, analytics, modeling, machine learning, optimization, IT infrastructure, processes, etc).
profile_positions.title: Senior Data Scientist (Global Food & Agri Strategy and Positioning - GFASP)

profile_positions.title: Senior Data Scientist (Center of Expertise, Advanced Analytics & Data, Retail Banking)

profile_positions.description:
Initiation & execution of a range of novel research projects:
- Applying Frequency domain analysis (i.e. Fast Fourier Transform) to estimate client's income
- Researching the applicability of a dynamic state-space approach towards the modeling of investor’s behavior
- Applying unsupervised learning methods to identify outlier data in investor’s behavior
- Predicting high volume buy/sell orders through various classifiers: Trees, LogReg, SVMs, KNNs,
& Ensemble methods
- Researching the applicability of deep learning approaches in marketing
- Team coaching (in analytics areas)
profile_positions.title: Senior Data Scientist (Customer Experience, Retail Banking)
